rowSearcher (service in module ui.grid )

Description

Service for searching/filtering rows based on column value conditions.

Methods

  • getTerm(filter)

    Get the term from a filter Trims leading and trailing whitespace

    Parameters

    • filter – {object} –

      object to use

    Returns

    {object} –

    Parsed term

  • guessCondition(filter)

    Guess the condition for a filter based on its term
    Defaults to STARTSWITH. Uses CONTAINS for strings beginning and ending with *s (*bob*). Uses STARTSWITH for strings ending with * (bo). Uses ENDS_WITH for strings starting with * (ob).

    Parameters

    • filter – {object} –

      object to use

    Returns

    {uiGridConstants.filter<int>} –

    Value representing the condition constant value

  • search(grid, rows, columns)

    Run a search across

    Parameters

    • grid – {Grid} –

      Grid instance to search inside

    • rows – {Array[GridRow]} –

      GridRows to filter

    • columns – {Array[GridColumn]} –

      GridColumns with filters to process

  • searchColumn(grid, row, column)

    Process filters on a given column against a given row. If the row meets the conditions on all the filters, return true.

    Parameters

    • grid – {Grid} –

      Grid to search in

    • row – {GridRow} –

      Row to search on

    • column – {GridCol} –

      Column with the filters to use

    Returns

    {boolean} –

    Whether the column matches or not.

  • stripTerm(filter)

    Remove leading and trailing asterisk (*) from the filter's term

    Parameters

    • filter – {object} –

      object to use

    Returns

    {uiGridConstants.filter<int>} –

    Value representing the condition constant value
